3DSX_IN_FOLDER_DESC: If enabled, 3DSX files will be put in a folder with the same name instead of directly in the set folder.
ARGUMENT_INVALID:
Argument invalid.
Please check the xml file for proper arguments.
AUTHOR: 作者
AUTO_UPDATE_UNISTORE_DESC: With this, the last used UniStore will be updated automatically when launching Universal-Updater.
AUTO_UPDATE_UU_DESC: When enabled, Universal-Updater will check for updates every time it's opened.
BOOT_TITLE: 您想要開啓這個程式嗎？
CREATE_SHORTCUT: 您想要創建一個捷徑嗎？
CUSTOM_FONT_DESC: If enabled, 'sdmc:/3ds/Universal-Updater/font.bcfnt' will be used instead of the system font, if found.
DELETE_PROMPT: 您確定要刪除此資料夾嗎？
DELETE_UNNEEDED_FILE: 正在刪除不需要的檔案...
ENTER_SEARCH: Enter what you like to search.
ENTER_URL: Enter the URL of the UniStore.
EXECUTE_ENTRY: Would you like to execute this entry?
FEATURE_SIDE_EFFECTS:
This Feature may have side effects while the Queue is running.
Are you sure you want to continue?
FILE_SLASH:
Seems like a '/' is included, which is not supported.
Please change 'file' to filename only.
GITHUB: Full credits can be found on GitHub
LOADING_SCREENSHOT: 正在載入螢幕擷取畫面...
SCREENSHOT_COULD_NOT_LOAD: 無法載入螢幕擷取畫面
SCREENSHOT_INSTRUCTIONS: Press  to change and  to zoom
SHEET_SLASH:
Seems like a '/' is included, which is not supported.
Please change 'sheet' to filename only.
START_SELECT: Press START to select the current folder
TITLE: 標題
UNISTORE_BG_DESC: When enabled, the UniStore's provided BG will be shown instead of the solid BG color for the top screen.
UNISTORE_INVALID_ERROR:
This UniStore is invalid and cannot be
loaded with Universal-Updater.
Maybe check if there are any Syntax errors?
UNISTORE_TOO_NEW:
Your version of Universal-Updater is
too old to use this UniStore.
Please update to the latest version.
UNISTORE_TOO_OLD:
This UniStore is outdated and cannot be used
with this version of Universal-Updater.
Please ask the creator to update it.
